page.title: Omnicom Profit Beats Wall Street View
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Omnicom Group <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=OMC.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">OMC.N</A> on Tuesday reported a quarterly profit that outpaced Wall Street expectations as the No. 1 advertising group added high-profile accounts and benefited from increased global ad spending.
